name: Transgender Gender-Variant Intersex Justice Project
description: TGI Justice Project offers legal and other services to the TGI community inside and outside of prisons, jails, and detention centers. They serve Black and Black/Brown Transgender, GNC/nonbinary, intersex people who are coming out of prisons, jails and locked facilities (system impacted, folks impacted by the carceral industrial complex) who are low income and no income – and their impacted families. We center Black trans women, we center Black TGI people
